manager should submit all bonuses and salaries of employees till day of the month.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"General Info\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In accordance with the Labor Code of the Republic of Lithuania salary should be paid \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"twice a month\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" unless the Employee requests salary to be paid once a month.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The first (advance) payment is equal\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":null},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" to \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"30% of the salary\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"#_msocom_1\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"(% of salary is not changeable) net pay and will be paid on the 20-25\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"th\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-superscript\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" day of the month. The rest will be paid on the 5-10\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"th\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-superscript\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" of the following month. In case the mentioned days are not working days, the salary will be paid on the next working day after the corresponding calendar day. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please note, that during the first month of employment newcomers will not receive advance payment.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"At request, the salary may be paid once - the 5-10\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"th\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-superscript\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" date of the following month. The salary will be paid to a nominated bank account.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-underlined\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Change bank account number\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If case employees would like to change their bank account number for salary payments (or they are opening a Lithuanian bank account), need \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"to send a filled-in payment request \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"form which can be found in \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://info.epam.com/policy/lithuania/vilnius/compensation-and-benefits.html\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Handbook\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" to the following email address \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:wfabankaccountchangelt@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"wfabankaccountchangelt@epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". All required fields should be filled in the request (name and surname, request date, date from which employee like to apply the changes, new bank account number, bank name, SWIFT code, signature).\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Payslip\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Employees' payslips will be sent to them after receiving full payment to their work email address. The pay slips will be protected with the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"last 4 digits of the personal code\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". If there are questions regarding payslips, employees should write:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:WFAHumanResourceLT@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WFAHumanResourceLT@epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" - if employees do not know the code to open payslip or don't receive it     \",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:WFAHumanResourceLT@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WFAPayrollLT@epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" - if employees have some questions regarding some lines in payslips. \",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You can find an example of payslip clarifications and detailed explanations about the Lithuanian tax system and rules of how vacation average salary is calculated \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://info.epam.com/policy/lithuania/vilnius/compensation-and-benefits/payslip.html\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"here\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-link\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":null},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"All changes in the contract like position, working way/shifts/hours, salary, should be documented by an annex to the local agreement. It is done by the Location Personnel officer.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]}]}}"
